cause.description:
While most of our country is "left-wing," we end up governed by a right-wing nut!
This is happening because the left vote is split between several parties, while the right is not.
If we combined all the left-leaning votes (from Liberal, NDP, Green, and Marxist) we would easily have a majority government.
HARPER AND THE CONSERVATIVES DON'T REPRESENT OUR POPULATION!!! GET THEM OUT!!!
1. Canadian citizens must be given a fair opportunity to vote out Harper and the conservatives.
2. While the majority of Canada is left-leaning, our left votes don't really "count" for what they are worth because they're split between many parties.
cause.mission: To spread support for an anti-Harper government ASAP!
cause.name: Stephen Harper Has To Go!
